name: Graple
description:
A 96x96 retro(game boy) style simple platformer.   Object of the game is to collect all the apples on each stage.  W/D or Arrow keys to move left/right.  Space Bar to jump.

Game was made using my own original engine(Reabs Cave) written in c++ using openGL.  I tried to make it similar in style to an OG gameboy game so total of 4 colors on screen.  The sprites are made of a 8x8 grid of indexs to the colors and the actual 96x96 pixels are a single runtime drawn texture with each pixel having 1 byte of data which also stores info such as if that pixel is part of a player/enemy/apple/platform. 

I just had some fun with this so there's not a lot to it,  Missing audio completely and could of made more levels but it was enjoyable non the less.
